basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Full-Stack Engineer | Python • AI/ML • Docker • Linux
basics.summary: Full-Stack Engineer with ~3 years of experience developing software solutions and optimizing AI/ML workflows (TensorFlow/Python). Proficient in Linux, Docker, Git, and REST APIs, with a strong background in collecting research data and validating prototypes. Proven track record of delivering production-ready code and optimizing infrastructure.

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Led software development, AI/ML optimization, and infrastructure management.
highlights: Maintained Linux-based ML training infrastructure using Docker and Flask to support algorithm optimization.
Engineered AdCognition ML system using Python and TensorFlow, evaluating results with 90%+ accuracy.
Implemented software modules and validated prototypes with NVIDIA Isaac Sim and OpenAI APIs.
Analyzed research data to optimize simulation inputs and detection models.
Designed and deployed production solutions ensuring security and scalability.

work.name: Trood
work.summary: Developed backend components and defined data integration logic.
highlights: Developed backend services and API REST endpoints using Go and Node.js.
Implemented and tested data models and serialization flows across services.
Collaborated on module definitions and inter-service communication via gRPC.

work.name: BigFoot Company
work.summary: Built dashboard features and optimized application logic.
highlights: Developed core software modules and workflows using Vue 3 and TypeScript.
Collaborated on API integration and optimized data flow with the backend team.
Ensured code quality through rigorous testing and responsive design implementation.

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Created automated software tools to improve process efficiency.
highlights: Developed 'Otis', a JavaScript-based tool that automated data entry and logic flows.
Won 1st place in Innovation Contest for optimizing team workflows.

courses: Bachelor Thesis: Building a Modern Fullstack Web Application

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Won for 'Otis' automation tool that streamlined templating and email workflows.

projects.name: AdCognition – End-to-End ML Ad Detection System
projects.description: Production ML system with Python/TensorFlow training stack and Dockerized deployment.
highlights: Built ML pipeline: Python training, model conversion, and Linux-based deployment.
Deployed Flask services in Docker containers with Nginx, ensuring strict security rules.
Evaluated algorithm performance using TensorBoard and achieved 90% accuracy.

projects.name: RoboGPT
projects.description: Simulation extension bridging Python robotics stack with AI language interfaces.
highlights: Validated prototypes for controlling robots via natural language commands.
Optimized simulation inputs using OpenAI APIs and LLMs.
